response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value for us, and we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Given its importance and the benefits it provides, we are willing to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We understand that this might be a substantial investment, but we are confident that it will pay off in terms of quality, functionality, and long-term value. If you're interested in learning more about the product or discussing how it could benefit you, please let me know. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
